players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on who seems out of place or behaves suspiciously."
Diana: "I agree with Bob's theory and suggest we keep a close eye on each other's actions to ensure the safety of our town. Let's not jump to conclusions, but be vigilant."
You: "I support Bob and Diana's suggestions to keep an eye on each other's actions. Let's work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
Diana: "Let's continue to be vigilant and keep an eye on each other's actions. Trust but verify, as we don't want any mafia members in our midst."
Bob: "I believe it's important for us to remain calm and not accuse each other without solid evidence. Let's focus on observing everyone's actions carefully and communicate openly with one another."
You: "I think we're all on the same page about keeping an eye out for any suspicious behavior. Let's continue to communicate openly and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on who seems out of place or behaves suspiciously."
Diana: "I agree with Bob's theory and suggest we keep a close eye on each other's actions to ensure the safety of our town. Let's not jump to conclusions, but be vigilant."
Alice: "I support Bob and Diana's suggestions to keep an eye on each other's actions. Let's work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
Diana: "Let's continue to be vigilant and keep an eye on each other's actions. Trust but verify, as we don't want any mafia members in our midst."
You: "I believe it's important for us to remain calm and not accuse each other without solid evidence. Let's focus on observing everyone's actions carefully and communicate openly with one another."
Alice: "I think we're all on the same page about keeping an eye out for any suspicious behavior. Let's continue to communicate openly and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."

Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on who seems out of place or behaves suspiciously."
You: "I agree with Bob's theory and suggest we keep a close eye on each other's actions to ensure the safety of our town. Let's not jump to conclusions, but be vigilant."
Alice: "I support Bob and Diana's suggestions to keep an eye on each other's actions. Let's work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
You: "Let's continue to be vigilant and keep an eye on each other's actions. Trust but verify, as we don't want any mafia members in our midst."
Bob: "I believe it's important for us to remain calm and not accuse each other without solid evidence. Let's focus on observing everyone's actions carefully and communicate openly with one another."
Alice: "I think we're all on the same page about keeping an eye out for any suspicious behavior. Let's continue to communicate openly and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
